Articles.Content:
I have created this custom particle FX in unity and exported the GameObject into a .mu with PartTools.

It should look something like this:

but it won´t work:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/439724558518583316/554361376743882762/turboJet.mu
This is the.mu I created.

It uses the texture FlameRedOrange found in Gamedata/Squad/FX

Can anyone here help me make this particle work with the panther, if possible as a module manager patch? That would help me out a lot.

 

Thanks in Advance

-HB Stratos

I have made another test, possibly works, but haven´t tested it yet because I want MM integration, but I don´t know how to do that.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/439724558518583316/554377490664259584/turboJet.mu

I tried to get a custom mu into the game recently and didn't have much luck either. I've made lots of parts but this is the first thruster i've done. Did you do any specific configuration for the plume mesh?

@HB Stratos Your particle will only recognize a texture file that is in the same folder with it and with the filename that you linked in its material. Make sure that this is the case when you export it from Unity.
thanks for that info, but I think I did that, I´ll check @JadeOfMaar
